p: The total polyphenol content (TPC) and the antioxidant capacity of the oils were determined by the ferric reducing antioxidant power (FRAP) and 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) assays using Trolox (53188-07-1, Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA) as a standard, according to the protocols described by [ 44] and adapted for Synergy™ HTX multimodal microplate reader, equipped with dual reagent injector module (BioTek Instruments, Inc., Winooski, VT, USA). All assays were performed in Corning ® Costar ® 96-well microplates (Corning Life Sciences., Oneonta, NY, USA).
